actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-1513.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Speaker to recognize for motions to suspend the rules Monday, December 9, 1974, and at any time during the remainder of the 2d session, 93rd Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions to suspend the rules on Monday, Decemmber 9, 1974, and at any subsequent time during the remainder of the second session, Ninety-third Congress.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Speaker to recognize for motions to suspend the rules Monday, December 9, 1974, and at any time during the remainder of the 2d session, 93rd Congress.
